documents.document: Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Alan Watts! More great change quotes: http://t.co/tUaKhhsHa4 http://t.co/KTZpirxAIA
The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance. - Alan Watts http://t.co/fF9F2ZmGZW
Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Lucy Maud Montgomery! http://t.co/vKC8D9QT2J
Tomorrow is always fresh, with no mistakes in it. - Lucy Maud Montgomery http://t.co/28wSbPInz1
@BrainyQuote We wish everyone celebrating a very happy Father's Day!
@BrainyQuote Have a Happy Father's Day!
Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Alex Haley! View more great Father's Day quotes: http://t.co/AcUxarXm3B http://t.co/h3ARR3x9Ai
In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future. - Alex Haley http://t.co/V7IkVXtdjH
Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Ezra Pound! http://t.co/JvQsgVXmpS
Genius... is the capacity to see ten things where the ordinary man sees one. - Ezra Pound http://t.co/LiQzCuEgR3
@28sempfs You're most welcome. Thanks for the praise!
Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Ralph W. Sockman! More great knowledge quotes: http://t.co/aFkAkxEtTy http://t.co/AxhpDEATTF
The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder. - Ralph W. Sockman http://t.co/IQKr960maI
Enjoy today's featured quote by Victor Kiam! http://t.co/FZRB7uluc6
Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward. - Victor Kiam http://t.co/9GDHVUw9k4
Enjoy today's featured quote by Anna Freud! http://t.co/zGbgYPBx1k
If some longing goes unmet, don't be astonished. We call that Life. - Anna Freud http://t.co/akxBef6HHY
Enjoy today's featured quote by Carter G. Woodson! http://t.co/e41E4NTB34
In fact, the confidence of the people is worth more than money. - Carter G. Woodson http://t.co/r8ITDz8o1H
Enjoy today's featured quote by Douglas Horton! http://t.co/yngL7BPAH2
Smile, it's free therapy. - Douglas Horton http://t.co/ecgXIWHKf4
Enjoy today's featured quote by Edwin Land! http://t.co/gZjlB4H3UQ
An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail. - Edwin Land http://t.co/WBYECHLjwj
Enjoy today's featured quote by Elizabeth Bowen! http://t.co/EjAZgZ0U0n
When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out. - Elizabeth Bowen http://t.co/gG3zurYL0q
Enjoy today's featured quote by Hans Hoffman! http://t.co/Hf6QuDS7yO
The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak. - Hans Hoffman http://t.co/3we6EX5Hct
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Ciardi! http://t.co/5xhkrAhQRT
The day will happen whether or not you get up. - John Ciardi http://t.co/05vFeaAzft
Enjoy today's featured quote by Frank Herbert! http://t.co/03gsshdNOS
Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken. - Frank Herbert http://t.co/CmaKCPFFEe
Enjoy today's featured quote by Demosthenes! http://t.co/jauDiDhJqf
Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises. - Demosthenes http://t.co/M8DeqlEyz2
Enjoy today's featured quote by Charles Morgan! http://t.co/vY8abA9Thn
As knowledge increases, wonder deepens. - Charles Morgan http://t.co/69vVmAW5xt
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Selden! Share more great friendship quotes: http://t.co/kwGYhawfSP http://t.co/5O22k5Cofv
Old friends are best. - John Selden http://t.co/5iLKdvIvXi
Enjoy today's featured quote by Anna Pavlova!
Enjoy today's featured quote by Anna Pavlova! http://t.co/2AM7cM2bjL
God gives talent. Work transforms talent into genius. - Anna Pavlova http://t.co/ic3K4nXQMk
Enjoy today's featured quote by B. F. Skinner! http://t.co/vq3AfpMLJQ
The way positive reinforcement is carried out is more important than the amount. - B. F. Skinner http://t.co/TF8vFBdWq2
Enjoy today's featured quote by Simone Weil! http://t.co/rvXEGA1k28
To be rooted is perhaps the most important and least recognized need of the human soul. - Simone Weil http://t.co/Yto737HgiG
Enjoy today's featured quote by M.C. Escher! http://t.co/Xbn3BJlwvG
My work is a game, a very serious game. - M.C. Escher http://t.co/HoS4mn8BFd
Enjoy today's featured quote by Elbert Hubbard! Share more freedom quotes: http://t.co/ICYTfqWTMQ http://t.co/DWVB9LK4yy
@BrainyQuote Happy Independence Day to all those in the U.S.A.!
Responsibility is the price of freedom. - Elbert Hubbard http://t.co/3sXcz2mj6H
Enjoy today's featured quote by Carl Von Clausewitz! Share more motivational quotes: http://t.co/T9qWWpT93M http://t.co/efG3iqgjy7
Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination. - Carl Von Clausewitz http://t.co/FjUkkWrBS7
Enjoy today's featured quote by Flannery O'Connor! http://t.co/gY1o3Xtaod
It is better to be young in your failures than old in your successes. - Flannery O'Connor http://t.co/6Sx0YRib8B
Enjoy today's featured quote by Isadora Duncan! http://t.co/tzB4xiWzAF
My motto - sans limites. - Isadora Duncan http://t.co/IHubcflk9i
Enjoy today's featured quote by Barbara Grizzuti Harrison! http://t.co/c7FA8iy5x0
There are no original ideas. There are only original people. - Barbara Grizzuti Harrison http://t.co/MfCtpcgfUH
Enjoy today's featured quote by Ellen Key! http://t.co/Iwqpp5LgkR
When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination. - Ellen Key http://t.co/8M9eDR1Qa7
Enjoy today's featured quote by Publilius Syrus! http://t.co/bXRBJRpzq0
Where there is unity there is always victory. - Publilius Syrus http://t.co/xeEUk70sGF
Enjoy today's featured quote by Jean Racine! http://t.co/TvEjH00fzy
There are no secrets that time does not reveal. - Jean Racine http://t.co/Dd8Fh0tgje
Enjoy today's featured quote by Marcel Proust! http://t.co/sMJFxuaBiz
The voyage of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes. - Marcel Proust http://t.co/OqjfdsBsOf
Enjoy today's featured quote by Charles Simmons! http://t.co/wmmT99mtJ3
Never go backward. Attempt, and do it with all your might. Determination is power. - Charles Simmons http://t.co/UsNnflk9NN
Enjoy today's featured quote by Errol Flynn! http://t.co/zATgUQQjAL
It isn't what they say about you, it's what they whisper. - Errol Flynn http://t.co/PJ0GXk1x8A
Enjoy today's featured quote by William R. Alger! http://t.co/U3hoTla9va
He who has no wish to be happier is the happiest of men. - William R. Alger http://t.co/VH1Hn0Uo22
Enjoy today's featured quote by Christopher Morley! http://t.co/fbrRBhfiIu
Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting. - Christopher Morley http://t.co/Ug9dPYxLqi
Enjoy today's featured quote by James Anthony Froude! http://t.co/U23ypCu5db
The essence of greatness is neglect of the self. - James Anthony Froude http://t.co/fD9VRHady9
Enjoy today's featured quote by Christopher Lasch! http://t.co/JDBue66x2x
Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success. - Christopher Lasch http://t.co/otShiefkS7
Enjoy today's featured quote by A. C. Benson! http://t.co/0aOeFaXBNj
Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene. - A. C. Benson http://t.co/5JqIFiIH5s
Enjoy today's featured quote by Stuart Chase! http://t.co/p8jI4Gn9sc
For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible. - Stuart Chase http://t.co/d2ZWVv3kZF
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Churton! http://t.co/Juau5GSSfR
Half our mistakes in life arise from feeling where we ought to think, and thinking where we ought to feel. - John Churton Collins
Enjoy today's featured quote by David Hockney! http://t.co/3p0ZNlvd9k
Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it. - David Hockney http://t.co/Vf0nP0KHNo
Enjoy today's featured quote by B. C. Forbes! http://t.co/FPlfGko5Ih
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. - B. C. Forbes http://t.co/53eeqZWBn5
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Florio! http://t.co/U8EzAvoYkN
Who has not served cannot command. - John Florio http://t.co/9wAlTrsLVW
Enjoy today's featured quote by Vernon Howard! http://t.co/DqfOUhLlyf
Our freedom can be measured by the number of things we can walk away from. - Vernon Howard http://t.co/EwE4PM0ESo
Enjoy today's featured quote by Joseph Addison! http://t.co/qfTL4tn4r8
Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week. - Joseph Addison http://t.co/gsMdnVa8z3
Enjoy today's featured quote by Plautus! http://t.co/XAu3x2dI1r
Where there are friends there is wealth. - Plautus http://t.co/Vrf7Jo8dSZ
Enjoy today's featured quote by Christopher Reeve! http://t.co/4q9KiiUc4m
Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out. - Christopher Reeve http://t.co/UaBntYEVaS
Enjoy today's featured quote by George Halas! http://t.co/IttDIKNrrz
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it. - George Halas http://t.co/LTsfKvQVmP
Enjoy today's featured quote by Ethel Barrymore! http://t.co/FMxVZKLlyZ
